snippet: Prime Minister Hun Sen engineered a pardon for his most prominent rival on Friday, clearing the way for the self-exiled politician to return home and campaign in the general election.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Hun Sen engineered a pardon for his most prominent rival on Friday, clearing the way for the self-exiled politician to return home and campaign in the general election.

headline.main: Cambodia: Hun Sen Rival Is Pardoned
headline.print_headline: Cambodia: Hun Sen Rival Is Pardoned
